title: Unable to login to portal
description: User reports authentication failure when trying to sign in with correct credentials. Error shown: 'Invalid token'.

title: Payment gateway timeout
description: Checkout fails intermittently; payments timeout after 30s. Occurs on mobile and desktop.

title: Profile picture upload corrupted
description: Image upload succeeds but uploaded avatar appears distorted on profile page.

title: Slow dashboard load times
description: Dashboard takes >10s to load for users with >200 items in their account.

title: Incorrect invoice total
description: Invoice #INV-092 shows wrong tax calculation for orders with discounts.

title: Search results missing recent items
description: Items created in the last 24 hours do not appear in search until indexing runs manually.

title: Notification emails not sent
description: Transactional emails (password reset, notifications) are queued but not delivered. SMTP returns 421 occasionally.

title: Mobile layout broken on iPhone SE
description: Layout overlaps on smaller screens; buttons become unclickable.

title: Export CSV contains malformed rows
description: CSV export for reports includes extra commas and breaks when fields contain newlines.

title: Two-factor authentication SMS delay
description: Users report receiving OTP SMS after 2â€“3 minutes causing timeouts on verification.

title: Account deletion request not processed
description: Delete account flow shows success but data remains in DB; user can still log in.

title: Typo in terms & conditions page
description: Several grammatical errors noticed on the terms page; need copy update.
